item.title: WORLD ACCEPTANCE CORP 10-K
item.description: WORLD ACCEPTANCE CORP, which is in the Personal Credit Institutions [6141] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 27, 2022 had 29396 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 467 instances financial - 308 instances 2022 - 261 instances credit - 246 instances loans - 243 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
